description: CholesterolLabTestCredential-v1 is a versioned schema created by Viken Blockchain Solutions (VBS), Scandinavia's premier blockchain provider. It is meticulously designed to define the structure for Verifiable Credentials that encapsulate the results of cholesterol level tests. VBS has developed this schema exclusively for testing and demonstration purposes to facilitate the standardized representation of cholesterol level test results.It's essential to emphasize that this schema is intended solely for testing and demonstration purposes and has not undergone validation or verification by any medical or healthcare entity.

credentialSubject.description: Stores the data of the credential
credentialSubject.title: Credential subject

testName.description: The name of the cholesterol level test being performed.
testName.title: Test Name

testResult.description: The object contains all the individual test results.
testResult.title: Test Result

TotalCholesterol.description: Results for the Total Cholesterol test.
TotalCholesterol.title: Total Cholesterol Test Result

value.description: The measured value of total cholesterol.
value.title: Value

unit.description: The unit of measurement for total cholesterol.
unit.title: Unit

referenceRange.description: The reference range for total cholesterol.
referenceRange.title: Reference Range

LDLCholesterol.description: Results for the LDL Cholesterol test.
LDLCholesterol.title: LDL Cholesterol Test Result

value.description: The measured value of LDL cholesterol.
value.title: Value

unit.description: The unit of measurement for LDL cholesterol.
unit.title: Unit

referenceRange.description: The reference range for LDL cholesterol.
referenceRange.title: Reference Range

HDLCholesterol.description: Results for the HDL Cholesterol test.
HDLCholesterol.title: HDL Cholesterol Test Result

value.description: The measured value of HDL cholesterol.
value.title: Value

unit.description: The unit of measurement for HDL cholesterol.
unit.title: Unit

referenceRange.description: The reference range for HDL cholesterol.
referenceRange.title: Reference Range

id.description: Stores the DID of the subject that owns the credential
id.title: Credential subject ID

name: CholesterolLabTestCredential-v1
